comments.text:
+Alice Vroman Okay, I see your point of view, and while I do agree with it, 
at the same time, you took it a tad too far with the insults. Part of this 
is the way you seemed to direct it at just anyone watching this at all who 
didn't pay for various reasons. Even I misunderstood you, sorry about that. 
But next time, please ease up on the insults, or directly say what you did 
to me. Thank you.
However, while professional movies don't tend to be free, some people do 
give them out for free- just look at lapfox trax, and all their artists. 
They make and post amazing music for free. (Although it's actually just one 
guy making the music with a crapload of names while his gf does the artwork)
If mondo wants to upload their movie in parts, that's fine. It also works 
as an advertisement. People see parts, get impatient, buy the movie.
